name: Aerial Fighters
description:
Welcome to the troubled airs of Aerial Fighters! 

You play as a war plane that must defeat Wolf-Girl's evil army of airplanes! But don't worry! You're not alone! you have your ally planes and tanks by your side! And with them, You'll defeat ALL of the enemies AND EVEN WOLF-GIRL HERSELF!!!

CONTROLS:

A KEY AND D KEY - movement

SPACE - shoot

SHIFT - fly faster

F - Shop

W KEY AND S KEY/UP ARROW AND DOWN ARROW - move around the shop

ENTER\SPACE - buy

I recommend playing on full-screen!

Credits: 

All code, music, assets and crying was done by me.

Sound-effects that are used in the game belong to Pixabay and to their respective owners.
